item.title: Hello World!
item.author: Nilesh Singh <nilesh@uncached.dev>
item.description:
Hello! Welcome to my latest attempt to write something meaningful.

I am a backend engineer and primarily work on distributed systems. This blog is going to the place where I publish my learnings, findings as an engineer, and stuff I find interesting in general.

I have been working with Kubernetes and Go in general, with a mix of JavaScript. I assume I would write about them first, but who knows - TBD!

A little about this blog’s existence. It has been up for some time now with zero content and lots of unnecessary AWS magic to support it. With Github pages, I am hoping to stop maintaining the site itself and finally do some writing. Letâ€™s see how this goes.

Here’s to all the optimism 2022 brings and a covid-free future ahead.

On to Blog Post #1 now.

func main() {
fmt.Println("Happy Holidays!")
}
